Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AssetPacksMan: Enables the import of locally installed mods (Mods in the user/Mods folder). These will already be loaded by the game (without icons). Activating this option may cause duplicate assets
Enables the import of subscribed asset packs.
Choose the amount of information that is logged. Cascading, Level Warning includes Error and Critical, for example.
Automatically hides APM Notifications after 30 seconds.
Displays a warning when APM detects local assets in the user/Mods folder. This is to prevent accidental loading of local assets.
Sets the minimum time between log entries. This is to prevent the NullReferenceExceptions caused by the logger.

Sometimes helps the issue of missing CID-Files. Deletes the cache of downloaded PDX Mods. This will close the game immediately. It will not change your playset, but will require to re-download all mods on the next startup. This might take a few minutes depending on the amount of subscribed mods.
Options.WARNING[AssetPacksManager.AssetP: **WARNING. This will close your game!** Are you sure you want to delete the mods cache? This cannot be undone.
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AssetPacksMan: A less agressive version of the Delete Mods Cache option. This will only delete mods that are missing the CID-File. This will close the game immediately. It will not change your playset, but will require to re-download all affected mods on the next startup.
Options.WARNING[AssetPacksManager.AssetP: **WARNING. This will close your game!** Are you sure you want to delete the affected mods cache? This cannot be undone.
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AssetPacksMan: Opens the log file of the mod in the default text editor. Log contains details about assets that failed to load.
